idea: SQK Valves, Fittings & Automation Private Limited is a leading manufacturer and seller of the reliable valves and best quality fittings in India catering to the global markets with a singular work ethic – the Endeavour to produce the finest quality products for the most quality-conscious customers with the availability across the globe. We are focused to provide complete flow solutions under one roof with highly experienced technocrats in Valves, actuators, control & piping solutions. Our wide range of products includes Ball, Gate, Globe, Check, Piston, Plug, Needle & Butterfly Valves as well as Automation products comprising of Pneumatic Actuator, Electrical Actuator, Hydraulic Actuator & Control System. The valves, we manufacture are varieties of Onshore & Offshore industries in their critical applications in Oil & Gas, Power, Metals/Minerals/Mining, Marine, Municipal, Food, Pharma, Chemicals, Petrochemicals, etc. We provide import substitution valves in the areas of automated valves, exotic metallurgy valves, control valves, large size valves, engineered valves, metal to metal seated valves, double block & bleed valves, etc. We offer shortened delivery schedules by way of well-laid supply chain links including foundries. We have design drawings & patterns. Our professional and experienced service personnel are available round the clock to offer any service requirements.
name: SQK VALVES FITTINGS & AUTOMATION PRIVATELIMITED

idea: Vedaayu is an online portal / Web Application based platform with a motive of connecting people in India & around the world to Alternative Medicine Practices. Our main aim is promote the National Health system thru the natural ways of healing. We are connecting the CAM Practitioners to the end users and proving the health journals and other important published material which will help and guide people about the importance of Natural ways of healing thru Ayurveda, Homeopathy, Unani and other therapies.
name: Vikram Maini

idea:
The idea of Hon. P.M of promoting Local to Vocal has given boost to my courage to create a online and offline platform which enables our Indian households, MSME, Women, Rural and traders by promoting and marketing their products and skills 

For Eg. A small firm in Bhopal makes traditional garments however its marketing is limited to local micro market, now our platform would help it promote offline and online through various marketing campaigns, social media identity, promotion, online shopping portals, fairs and other Indian market


Now in service categories, assume a lady in Himachal pradesh is a qualified yoga teacher, and would like to teach and earn through online teaching, in such scenario our platform would host a skill and teaching section where we would market her skills and get her clients where she can teach online and in lockdown the customers can avail the benefit of learning from home without leaving their home. This would connect customers all over India to top skills without leaving their home and risking their lives.


In this way we would like to connect dots and create a large platform to promote, market, sales and educate women, small traders, rural firms, small household business, skills and teachings of qualified people and experts to whole of India
name: Akshay A Shah

idea: Hello I am Nitin Lalitkumar Maniar age 48, born on 19th Nov 1971, at Mulund – Mumbai – Maharashtra - India, I completed my education SSC in 1989 from Sampson English High School, Mulund, Completed my Diploma in Commercial Art and Screen Printing form Adriot Institutes and Diploma in Computer Hardware – Software from United Computers. Then I started a small canvassing business of pre-printed stationary like Visiting Cards and all office stationary designing & printing also advertising agency, in 1999 my Photography hobby turns in to photojournalism, I worked as a freelance photojournalist for many reputed newspapers. In 2008 I started a local suburb based multilingual Tabloid Newspaper from Mulund. As technology upgraded, from last 3 years I have converted my newspaper in to a YouTube Channel.
name: NITIN LALITKUMAR MANIAR

idea: Vgyapun is an online learning platform aimed at professionals and students in the Indian advertising industry. We connect the right institutes and tutors with potential students seeking online courses in design, applied art, and creative communication space.Our mission is to give people the power to build better brands by equipping them with the right knowledge and resources
name: VIVEK HIRALAL MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
